question.title: Find Customers With Positive Revenue this Year
question.translatedTitle: 寻找今年具有正收入的客户
question.metaData: {"mysql":["Create table If Not Exists Customers (customer_id int, year int, revenue int)"],"mssql":["Create table Customers (customer_id int, year int, revenue int)"],"oraclesql":["Create table Customers (customer_id int, year int, revenue int)"],"database":true,"name":"find_customers","pythondata":["Customers = pd.DataFrame([], columns=['customer_id', 'year', 'revenue']).astype({'customer_id':'Int64', 'year':'Int64', 'revenue':'Int64'})"],"postgresql":["Create table If Not Exists Customers (customer_id int, year int, revenue int)"],"database_schema":{"Customers":{"customer_id":"INT","year":"INT","revenue":"INT"}}}
